name: Lube Slidewalker
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2017 by Unai Cabezon, George Degenkamp, Austin Eathorne, May Kwan, John Livingston, Alex Rushdy, and Takashi.

The theme was "Waves" so we made a game about a lubed up Danny DeVito.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Aim and fire your lube by pressing the W,A,S,D keys. Then propel yourself along your slippery lube path to become the ultimate Slidewalker™.
